title: Pulling All Submodules from Remote
description: When working with Git repositories, submodules can be used to include other repositories as dependencies. However, when these dependencies are updated in their respective remotes, the changes are not automatically reflected in the main repository. In order to update the submodules, you need to pull them from their respective remotes.

meta.description: Learn how to efficiently update Git submodules in your repository and keep your dependencies up-to-date.
